## VividSoundLab (VSL)
**VividSoundLab (VSL) at HLC**  
[VSL at HLC](https://www.hlc.uzh.ch/de/research_innovation/labs_technologies/vsl.html)  
Location: Stampfenbachstrasse 73, 8006 Zürich (UZH, STB)

### Equipment & Features

**3D Audio System:**
- 42-speaker dome array
- Multiple overlapping 3D audio encoders (e.g. higher order Ambisonics)

**Audio Hardware:**
- RME 64-channel digital audio interface
- Low-latency and real-time implementation, synchronization with sensor systems

**Software & Integration:**
- SPAT (Spatial Audio Processing)
- Max/MSP
- OSC (Open Sound Control)

**EEG System:**
- Brain Products 64-channel EEG system

**Physiological Monitoring:**
- Pulse oximetry
- Electromyography (EMG)
- Electrocardiography (ECG)
- Respiration monitoring
- Galvanic skin response (GSR)

## Scheuchzerstrasse Lab (SCH)
**Interdisciplinary Tinnitus Research**  
[https://tinnitus.uzh.ch](https://tinnitus.uzh.ch)  
Location: Scheuchzerstrasse 21, 8006 Zürich (UZH, SCH)

### Equipment & Features

**EEG Systems:**

- 2× Brain Products 64-channel EEG systems
- 1× BioSemi 128-channel EEG system
- Soundproof research booths


**Eye Tracking:**

- SR Research EyeLink 1000 eye tracker
- Face tracking

**Physiological Monitoring:**

- Pulse oximetry
- Electromyography (EMG)
- Electrocardiography (ECG)
- Respiration monitoring
- Galvanic skin response (GSR)
- Environmental sensors


**Neurostimulation:**

- Soterix MxN-33 Ultra HD electrical neurostimulator
